ShareRecipe.title: Share your recipes
ShareRecipe.description: Post your recipes to share them with others

SearchRecipes.title: Search for recipes
SearchRecipes.description: Search for recipes by categories, cuisine types and recipe names

SaveFavRecipes.title: Save favorite recipes
SaveFavRecipes.description: Add recipes you liked to your favs

LearnCuisines.title: Learn new cuisines
LearnCuisines.description: Try cooking other cuisines and explore this interesting culinary world

SignUpCard1.title: Sign up to explore your wished recipes

SignUpCard2.title: Sign up to create your recipes

SectionSignUp.description: Create an account and explore your desired recipes and follow your favorite creators and many more!

Footer.Text: Share your recipes with other people, look for new ideas and get inspired by other people's dishes

AboutPage.welcomeText: Welcome to the Recipe Platform, a place where cooking enthusiasts can discover, share, and organize their favorite recipes. This platform is designed to make cooking easier and more enjoyable by providing a user-friendly interface and a wide range of features to help you manage your culinary creations.

recipeManagement.title: Recipe Management
recipeManagement.listItem1: Easily add, edit, and organize your recipes.

viewRecipes.title: View recipes
viewRecipes.listItem1: A page with recipe cards displaying the title, image, short description.
viewRecipes.listItem2: Detailed recipe page with full details and comments.
viewRecipes.listItem3: Add recipes to "Favorites" for quick access.

userAuth.title: User registration and authentication
userAuth.listItem1: Logging in and logging out of the app.

searchAndFilter.title: Search and Filter
searchAndFilter.listItem1: Search by a recipe name, cuisine types and categories (e.g. breakfast, sugar free, desserts, etc.).

userProfile.title: User Profile
userProfile.listItem1: Personal profile with information about the user.

createRecipes.title: Creating and editing recipes
createRecipes.listItem1: Form for adding a new recipe with fields: name, ingredients, step-by-step description, cooking time, photos.
createRecipes.listItem2: Possibility to edit and delete your own recipes.

aboutMe.title: About Me
aboutMe.AboutText: Hi, I'm Valerie, the creator of this platform. I'm passionate about cooking, nutritionology üß¨ and technology üë©üèª‚Äçüíª, and I wanted to create a tool that combines both of these interests. With a background in web-development, I aimed to build a platform that is not only functional but also enjoyable to use. I hope you find this Recipe Platform helpful and inspiring for your culinary adventures!

min.recipeTitle: Title must be at least 3 characters long
min.instructions: Instructions must be at least 50 characters long

min.default: Must be greater than or equal to {min}

number.max: Must be less than or equal to {max}

array.foodCategory: At least one food category must be selected
array.cuisineType: At least one cuisine type must be selected
array.foodCategoryRequired: Please select at least one category

ShareRecipePage.title: Share your recipe
ShareRecipePage.subtitle: Let your culinary creations shine! Share your delicious recipes with our audience by filling out the form below. Your expertise can inspire and delight others in our flavorful community.

instructions.title: Instructions
instructions.subtitle: To unlock the full flavor and perfect your culinary masterpiece, it's crucial to meticulously detail every step of the recipe!
instructions.placeholder: Write here your instructions for the recipe...

RecipeForm.DeepenEngagement: Deepen user engagement with your recipe

ImageUpload.title: Gallery
ImageUpload.subtitle: Boost reliability and engagement by sharing up to 8 images of your mouthwatering creations! (An image should not exceed 5Mb)
